Hello!

I'm glad you're here. I'm Sarah, a designer and writer based in the Pacific Northwest. I believe in the power of good design—together, we can make the web a better place.

When I'm not pursuing my craft, I can probably be found treasure hunting at thrift stores, enriching my world with audiobooks, or figuring out how to get some CSS styling just right.

Take a look around! You can see examples of my designs here, and read what I'm up to on my blog. If you want to collaborate on a project (or just grab coffee and swap reading lists), get in touch.

This website was lovingly made from scratch and is powered by GitHub, Jekyll, and copious amounts of chocolate.
